Funkenschlag: Die ersten Funken
Hoogspanning: De eerste vonken
Mégawatts: Les Premières Étincelles
Power Grid: The First Sparks
Pravek
boardgame.description: In 2001, 2F-Spiele published the original Funkenschlag._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In 2011, it is time to look back...a long time back! To celebrate the tenth anniversary of the original Funkenschlag, designer Friedemann Friese will take you back in time and let you relive the early beginnings of mankind. True to the name of the German edition (a literal translation of which is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Flying Sparks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;), it is time for Funkenschlag: Die ersten Funken, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The First Sparks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The First Sparks transports the Funkenschlag mechanisms into the Stone Age. The order of phases during a game round, the player order, the technology cards: you know all these parts from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Funkenschlag_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;. But what is new? What is different?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The First Sparks is much faster and far more direct. You are immediately part of the action. Each turn, each decision is important. As a clan leader you decide on the well-being of your clan during the Stone Age. You need to develop new hunting technologies and get new knowledge - to successfully hunt food or to learn to control fire. With the help of these skills, you will harvest enough food to feed your clan and spread it far enough to reach new hunting areas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In a game of The First Sparks you are always confronted with many decisions: Which technology cards offer you the biggest advantages? When is the right time to spread your clan on the game board? Which hunting areas will grant the most food? Reaching new hunting areas or trying to secure parts of the game board for your own clan are important factors for your strategy. Empty spaces are cheaper for you to settle compared to spaces in which other clans are already settled. If you are the first to increase your clan size to 13 clan members, you win The First Sparks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Carnagecast Extrasode 5: A Dark and Stormy Night
Ep 070 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 3rd Anniversary Special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Tournament to the Death!!!
Episode 11: War, Cavemen and Hula Girls
Episode 20: The Settlers of Catan/Time Management
Episode 3 - Dumbing Down the Spiel des Jahres
Low Player Count - Ep 13 - Luck in Games
Session Impressions: Power Grid: The First Sparks
Wooden Cubes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Iron Soldiers: “Viking and Mouse Attack…” Episode 13

original German 2F edition new and shrinkwrapped in perfect condition

Rio Grande Games (RIO 461)
As clan leader you are responsible for the well-being of your clan during the Stone Age. You need to develop new hunting technologies and get new knowledge, to successfully hunt food or to learn to control fire. With help of these skills you will harvest enough food to feed your clan and to spread it far enough to reach new hunting areas. In this game you are always confronted with manifold decisions: which technology cards offer you the biggest advantages, when it is the right time to spread your clan on the game board, which hunting areas will grant the most food? Reaching new hunting areas or trying to secure parts of the game board for your own clan are important factors for your strategy. Empty spaces are cheaper for your clan to settle in compared to spaces, where other clans already settled earlier. If you are the first to increase your clan size to 13 clan members you will win The First Sparks.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 3 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. I will only charge the actual USPS or UPS (your choice) shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. The game has been played but is in excellent condition. The pieces have been sorted and bagged. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will be glad to combine orders to save on shipping.

DO NOT BUY This listing is for a specific sale arranged on the forum. Some of these games have an Avery paper label on the inside of the box lid or tuck flap with my name and contact information. These entries are noted as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ex Libris_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Power Grid the First Sparks. Minor box wear. Components in excellent condition. Ex Libris. Valu, metal tin edition. Excellent condition. Unexploded Cow. Moderate box wear, stickers on box. Components in good condition. The Hanging Gardens. Minor box wear, large sticker on box front. Components in good condition. Steam Tunnel, by Cheap Ass Games. Bag well worn. Rules bent, cards in good condition. Spirits of the Rice Paddy. Minor box wear, dented corner. Components in great condition. Scotland Yard, Milton Bradley 1985(?) edition. Moderate box wear, some surface damage from tape removal. Possibly missing a few tokens, box insert has a few tears on small pieces, components otherwise in good condition. Aquadukt. Moderate box wear, significant dishing and tape residue. Components in excellent condition. Ex Libris. Boggle, Parker Brothers blue box 1992 edition. Major box wear. Components in good condition. Includes second set of components in brown. Ex Libris. http://anythingbutpaypal.com
